LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.AdditionalCategories.Description
LocaleResource.Value: If you have chosen a category data source you can add additional categories to this Carousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.AdditionalCategories.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the JCarousel before you can add category mappings.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.AdditionalManufacturers.Description
LocaleResource.Value: If you have chosen a manufacturer data source you can add additional manufacturers to this Carousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.AdditionalManufacturers.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the JCarousel before you can add manufacturer mappings.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.AdditionalProducts.Description
LocaleResource.Value: If you have chosen a product data source you can add additional products to this Carousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.AdditionalProducts.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the JCarousel before you can add product mappings.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.ClickToConfigure
LocaleResource.Value: To configure the plugin either click HERE or go to Plugins -> Nop JCarousel -> Manage JCarousels

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.GeneralSettings.Enable.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When you check this option, the JCarousel will be enabled.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.GeneralSettings.GeneralSection.JCarouselItemMinWidth.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the minimum width of the JCarousel item.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.AnimationSpeed
LocaleResource.Value: The speed of the scroll animation

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.AnimationSpeed.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The speed of the scroll animation in terms ("none", "slow" or "fast"). If set to "none", animation is turned off.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.Autoscroll.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies after how many seconds to periodically autoscroll the content. If set to 0 (default) then autoscrolling is turned off.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.CarouselOrientation
LocaleResource.Value: Rotate the JCarousel to vertical position (default: horizontal)

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.CarouselOrientation.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the carousel appears in horizontal or vertical orientation. Changes the carousel from a left/right style to a up/down style carousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.DataSourceType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies predefined type of data that will populate the JCarousel plugin e.g. "Featured Products", "Related Products", etc.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.Easing.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The name of the easing effect that you want to use.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.ImageSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies a custom JCarousel image size. If set to 0 the image size will be the default nopcommerce picture tumbnail image size.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.Name.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the name of the JCarousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.Name.Required
LocaleResource.Value: Name of the JCarousel is REQUIRED.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.NumberOfItems.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The maximum number of items that will contain the JCarousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.NumberOfVisibleItems
LocaleResource.Value: Number of visible items in the JCarousel

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.NumberOfVisibleItems.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify the number of visible items at a time, that are going to be shown in the JCarousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.JCarouselItemMinWidth.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the minimum width of the JCarousel item. If this setting is equal to zero, then the default common setting will be used.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.ScrollItems
LocaleResource.Value: Number of items to scroll by

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.ScrollItems.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The number of items to scroll by.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.ShowDetailsButton.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked a details button will be shown in the JCarousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.ShowRatings.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked ratings will be shown for every product in the carousel. This works only for product data sources.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.ShowItemsName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the names of the products will be shown in the JCarousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.ShowProductsOldPrice.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the old price of the products will be shown in the JCarousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.ShowProductsPrice.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the price of the products will be shown in the JCarousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.ShowShortDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the short description will be shown in the JCarousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.ShowTitle.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the title of the JCarousel will be shown.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.Skin.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specufies a custom class name for the current JCarousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.StartIndex.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The index of the item to start with.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.Title.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify a title, that will be displayed before the JCarousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.WidgetZoneNames.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The names of the widget zone in which the JCarousel is added.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.Settings.WrapItems.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to wrap at the first/last item (or both) and jump back to the start/end. Options are "none", "first", "last", "both" or "circular". If set to "none", wrapping is turned off (default).

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.StoreMapping.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the JCarousel before you can edit Stores.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.WidgetZones.AddJCarousel
LocaleResource.Value: Add the JCarousel to new widget zone

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.WidgetZones.Carousel.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The JCarousel which will be added to this widget.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.WidgetZones.ChooseJCarousel
LocaleResource.Value: Please choose which JCarousel you will want to be displayed in the widget:

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.WidgetZones.CreateNewJCarousel
LocaleResource.Value: If you like you can create new JCarousel, which you can add.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.WidgetZones.Description
LocaleResource.Value: You can add the {0} JCarousel to as many widget zones as you would like. Just create a new widget by selecting the desired widget zone and click the 'Add new' button.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.WidgetZones.DisplayOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The display order for the widget that will be created for the JCarousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.WidgetZones.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the JCarousel before you can add it to a widget zone.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JCarousel.Admin.WidgetZones.WidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The widget zone to which the JCarousel will be added.
